response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and the value it brings to you, we believe it's worth more than what others might offer. Considering its true worth and your potential benefit, we propose a special introductory price of $14,000 for you. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to ensure your complete satisfaction. We're confident this investment will pay off in numerous ways, enhancing your operations or personal endeavors significantly. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 14000}
